alert.note: Alert for Anderson; Campbell (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 29 at 5:58PM CDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 730 PM EDT FOR NORTHEASTERN ANDERSON...SOUTHERN CAMPBELL AND WEST CENTRAL UNION COUNTIES... At 657 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Jacksboro, or 7 miles southwest of La Follette, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Clinton, La Follette, Jacksboro, Caryville, Rocky Top, Norris, Norris Dam State Park, Disney, Cove Lake State Park and Andersonville. This includes Interstate 75 in Tennessee between mile markers 120 and 137. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
